transport.access_summary: Bus services run from Penrith to Glenridding, with the trailhead a short walk away.

ai.summary: A legendary Lake District route climbing Helvellyn via the exposed Striding Edge ridge, offering dramatic views and exhilarating scrambling.
ai.terrain_summary: Narrow exposed ridge; hands-on scrambling required. Steep ascents and descents with loose rock.
ai.safety_notes: Only for experienced walkers. Avoid in high winds, snow or poor visibility. Scrambling sections require care.
ai.best_seasons: Late spring to early autumn in good conditions.

seo.title: Helvellyn via Striding Edge â€“ Classic Lake District Scramble
seo.meta_description: A challenging 12 km mountain route to Helvellyn via the iconic Striding Edge ridge. For experienced hikers.
